thread.title: What Is Vancouver Like in April?
thread.title_full: What Is Vancouver Like in April?

title: What Is Vancouver Like in April?
text:
‹ March in Vancouver | May in Vancouver › Warmer Weather and Longer Days Make April a Great Time to Visit Vancouver Spring in Vancouver , though wet, is mild and pleasant. Spring flowers are in full bloom and people emerge from their winter hibernation to hit the streets and Stanley Park to roller blade, hike and bike.
April Weather in Vancouver: April daily high: 14ºC (57ºF), highest ever in April: 26ºC (79ºF) April daily low: 4ºC (39ºF), lowest ever in April: -3ºC (27ºF) Visitors can expect rain about half the days in April. 
What to Pack for Vancouver in April: Pack for a wide range of temperatures, especially if you're planning to be near the water. Shorts; t-shirts; long sleeve shirts, light, long pants; sandals; closed-toe shoes. Water-resistant wear
